body: @labrax I'm feeling the same bruh~At first,NTR broke my heart but after watching and reading some hentai,my dick got use to it so it's all good now

@sekaisan dude lol, i've been read H-doujins for 6 years and NTR its my favorite. yeah NTR make unpleasant feels but its fucking good at the same time (not applied irl though). tbh rn i can't feels any sad emotions at all, maybe i've read too much Hentai lol.

LOL 3 years! 

Some people like netorare. Don't read if you don't like it. You can see pretty much anything in a doujin or hentai. This is why hentai and doujin are special. You haven't been watching long enough to get the concept yet I guess :P

Till today, after 3 years + of reading doujins, i still dont understand the need for netorare. I feel so sad for the characters. It pains me to say that the art was splendid and well executed but my heart aches when i read such a sad story. Still, this motivates me to hit the gym even harder everytime so that i can tell myself the LIE that if this ever happens to me i will be strong enough to fight for the girl i love.
